name: Scooby-Doo! Case File #1: The Glowing Bug Man
name_original: Scooby-Doo! Case File #1: The Glowing Bug Man
description:
Scooby-Doo! Case File #1: The Glowing Bug Man is an educational puzzle game developed by The Learning Company. It was originally released in 2002. The Learning Company published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Scooby-Doo! Case File #1: The Glowing Bug Man on PC.
